name: Simkl (Full Sync Fork)
overview: Adds full Simkl library sync plus Simkl→Jellyfin restoration with dry-run logging.
description: Forked Simkl plugin with manual full-sync, Simkl-to-Jellyfin watched-state imports, dry-run logging, and compatibility fixes for Jellyfin 10.9+.

versions.changelog: Adds manual full sync, Simkl→Jellyfin watched import, dry-run logging, and repo manifest.
